spell.name: Psychic Coalescence
entries: You will your psychic energy into physical form, conjuring in your hand three gemstones filled with psionic energy. You or someone else can make a ranged spell attack with one of the gemstones by throwing it or hurling it with a {@item sling|phb}. If thrown, a gemstone has a range of 60 feet. If someone else attacks with a gemstone, that attacker adds your spellcasting ability modifier, not the attacker's, to the attack roll. On a hit, the target takes piercing damage equal to {@damage 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Whether the attack hits or misses, the spell effect then ends on that gemstone and it disappears.
If you cast this spell again, the spell ends on any gemstone still affected by your previous casting and they disappear.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d6}), 11th level ({@dice 3d6}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d6}).
